data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Cardiff get the game underway.
Junior Hoilett (Cardiff) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, David Webb blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Reading with the kick-off.
Goal! A Michael Morrison header gives Reading a 0-1 lead in Cardiff.
In the minute 53, Kieffer Moore (Cardiff) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lee Tomlin is on a sub for Will Vaulks for Cardiff.
Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a first substitution, with Tom Holmes replacing Felipe Araruna.
In the minute 66, Reading take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Lucas Joao.
Neil Harris is making the team's second substitution at Cardiff City Stadium with Robert Glatzel replacing Junior Hoilett.
Tom McIntyre is replacing Yakou Meite for the away team.
In the minute 81, Goal! Lee Tomlin pulls one back for Cardiff to make it 1-2.
The away team replace Lucas Joao with George Puscas.
The match has come to a close in Cardiff. The final score is 1-2.
Cardiff make their third substitution with Josh Murphy replacing Gregory Cunningham.
Michael Olise for Reading has been booked by David Webb and receives a first yellow card.
